refnamediv.refpurpose: (Matlab function) Detect an object of a given type

refsection.title: Particular cases
refsection.para: There is no equivalent function for Matlab isa function in Scilab but it can be replaced by equivalent syntaxes as shown is examples.

td.programlisting: a = isa(x,'logical') b = isa(x,'char') c = isa(x,'numeric') d = isa(x,'int8') e = isa(x,'uint8') f = isa(x,'int16') g = isa(x,'uint16') h = isa(x,'int32') k = isa(x,'uint32') l = isa(x,'single') m = isa(x,'double') n = isa(x,'cell') o = isa(x,'struct') p = isa(x,'function_handle') q = isa(x,'sparse') r = isa(x,'lti')
